2 Mass. plans vie for savings on health care

State Senate leaders want less-aggressive spending limits on the health care industry than the House proposed, and fewer controls on high-priced care. (Boston Globe)

Cohasset man to be charged in death

John McDonough faces a manslaughter charge after David Hoelzer was found unresponsive in McDonough's home last night and later died. (Globe, 8:49 a.m.)

Contact lost with Russian-made plane

A plane carrying 46 people has lost contact with air controllers while flying over mountains during a demonstration in western Indonesia. (AP, 8:40 a.m.)
